name: MtG Deckbuilder
disc: Build, manage, and share your Magic the Gathering decks with this full-stack web application.

name: DungeonBox
disc: A full-stack react application that allows users to create, edit, and manage characters for Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition.

name: Mingo
disc: A full-stack text based social media website where users can post about their favorite topics, and comment on other's posts

name: Pixel Quest
disc: A Browser-Based role playing game where players can fight various enemies with a variety of skills and trigger different events.
